name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Full-Stack Engineer with extensive expertise in **C#.Net**, **JavaScript**, **React.js**, **SQLServer**, **Oracle**, and **AWS**. Adept at designing and implementing **Microservices** architecture, utilizing **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, and integrating **AI** solutions for enhanced application performance. Proven ability to leverage strong understanding of **Algorithms** and **Data Structures** to create efficient, scalable solutions. Skilled in **Object-Oriented Design** and known for excellent **Communication** skills, effectively collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver robust applications in healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors. Committed to clean, efficient coding practices and driving improvements through automation and innovative architecture.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed scalable microservices architecture using **C#.Net** and **Java (Spring Boot)**, achieving a **95%** accuracy rate in patient tracking and improving adherence through innovative AI-driven reminders.
Implemented responsive UI components with **React.js** and **JavaScript**, enhancing user experience and reducing task completion time by **30%**.
Designed and built RESTful APIs ensuring secure EHR integration with **Spring Data JPA**, **Spring Security**, and **OAuth2**, resulting in a **40%** improvement in data accuracy.
Orchestrated containerization of applications using **Docker**, providing streamlined deployment solutions across multiple environments.
Established CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, leading to a **80%** reduction in deployment times and promoting iterative development.
Managed AWS infrastructure with **Kubernetes (AWS EKS)** and **Terraform**, achieving a **99.9%** uptime and optimizing performance through Redis caching strategies.
Effectively communicated technical concepts and project updates to stakeholders, fostering collaborative efforts and transparency.

Developed scalable applications utilizing **C#.Net** and **JavaScript** to enhance user experience and increase customer satisfaction by 30%.
Implemented **Microservices** architecture to optimize system performance and facilitate independent deployability, resulting in a 40% faster release cycle.
Leveraged **React.js** for dynamic front-end development, contributing to a 25% decrease in load times and improving user engagement.
Utilized **SQLServer** and **Oracle** databases for efficient data management, boosting query performance by 35%.
Applied design patterns following **Object-Oriented Design** principles to ensure maintainability and scalability in code, reducing technical debt by 20%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance communication channels, ensuring project milestones were met 100% of the time.
Streamlined deployment processes using **AWS** and **Kubernetes**, achieving a 50% reduction in infrastructure setup time.

- Developed robust backend REST APIs using **C#.Net** and **SQLServer**, ensuring high availability with **99%** uptime.
- Created dynamic and responsive user interfaces with **React.js** and **JavaScript**, achieving a **50%** increase in user engagement.
- Designed microservices architecture to enhance scalability and maintainability, reducing deployment times by **30%**.
- Implemented efficient data handling and storage solutions using **Oracle**, optimizing query performance by **25%**.
- Integrated AI-driven features to enhance user experience, employing advanced **algorithms** and **data structures**.
- Led collaborative team efforts to communicate project updates effectively, facilitating a more streamlined development process.
